name: Fiora Naturals Hair Detangling Brush for Women - Detangler Hair Brush w/Flexible Soft Bristles- Gently Glides Through Tangles - Curly, Fine, Dry and Shower Wet HairBrush, cepillo para cabello - Green
short_description: NO-PULL HAIR BRUSH DETANGLER- Unlike ordinary brushes that tug and pull on knots, causing breakage and pain, our detangling hair brushes for women is designed to adapt to the shape of your scalp and glide through tangles with comfort. The innovative anti-static nylon bristles help reduce frizz while evenly distributing the scalp's natural oils, leaving your hair silky, shiny, and healthy-looking with every stroke.

CUTS DRYING TIME TO HALF- Our vented, contoured design channels airflow directly from your dryer to your hair, removing excess moisture faster and saving you valuable time. Long, flexible bristles reach deep into every layer of hair, while the non-slip ergonomic handle ensures a comfortable grip for effortless styling.

GENTLE FAMILY DETANGLER BRUSH -Designed for the whole family, this detangle brush makes hair care simple and pain-free for women, men, kids, and seniors alike. The flexible spiral bristle system effortlessly untangles hair, taking the tears out of detangling for children and toddlers while also offering gentle scalp care for the elderly. Ultra-soft nylon bristles distribute natural oils for smoother, shinier strands, making it the perfect everyday brush for every hair type and every age

CURLY, STRAIGHT, OR WAVY – This versatile shower hair brush is perfect for wet or dry hair, effortlessly removing knots and tangles from every strand. Ideal as a shower brush for hair, it works beautifully on natural, thin, thick, kinky, coily, frizzy, or dyed hair — and even glides easily through extensions and wigs.

BIO-FRIENDLY & RECYCLABLE - Crafted from Earth-Friendly material, It is 100% vegan and has absolutely 0% animal hair in its bristles and , our vented natural detangler is a up to 100% biodegradable functional, sustainable, and stylish choice for your everyday hair care.
